title: PSP FIELDS 4 samples per cycle cadence Fluxgate Magnetometer (MAG) data in RTN coordinates - Stuart D. Bale (bale@berkeley.edu) (UC Berkeley Space Sciences Laboratory)

info.x_cadence_note: Cadence based on variable 'epoch_mag_RTN_4_Sa_per_Cyc' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/psp/fields/l2/mag_rtn_4_per_cycle/2018/psp_fld_l2_mag_rtn_4_sa_per_cyc_20181002_v02.cdf.
